en.title: FusionExcel at NATPRO 2009!
en.content:
REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR RACHEL THOMAS.

Natpro 2009, a Herbal and Natural Products Expo was held at the Kuala Lumpur PWTC from the 10th – 12th April, 2009. 

The above event was supported by PD Rachel Thomas, Distributors and new comers – namely, Sylvia KT, Boey GG, Matilda, Anthony Phong and Subadra Devi. 

Ghanna Country Licensee Pas Fredie and Pas Julia were also present at the Expo to get first hand experience and were encouraged with the wealth of experience and knowledge gained and seeing the response from visitors. 

This Expo gave and built the Distributors confidence even more because of the various positive and exciting respond from the public. It was a great exposure – for the Company and the amazing and wonderful Quantum Science Products.

Visitors visiting the 3 days expo who were mainly interested in alternative and natural products were extremely amazed by the demonstrations and instant result of of the Quantum Pendant and drinking scalar energized water. They were just blown away with the unbelievable experience of balance, flexibility, stability and strength. Remarks - “that little round thing” – just unimaginable!

FusionExcel booth had visitors from Singapore, Mexico, Denmark, UK and Sudan. Many showed keen interest – many purchased – and there were many follow ups to keep the distributors busy as the bee!
